text: William James "Bill" Wade (October 4, 1930 - March 9, 2016) was an American football quarterback. He played professionally in the National Football League (NFL). He was thought as one of the greatest athletes in Nashville and Vanderbilt University history.Tenneseean Bill Wade, Vanderbilt, NFL Chicago Bears Wade was a member of the Tennessee Sports Hall of Fame. He was best known for being the starting quarterback on the Chicago Bears' 1963 NFL championship team. He also played for the Los Angeles Rams. Wade died in Nashville, Tennessee on March 9, 2016. He was aged 85. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Los Angeles Rams players Category:Sportspeople from Nashville, Tennessee
title: Bill Wade
